name: Carmichael's Elite Mobile Detailing

name: Fusion Upgrade
description: Full-stack Ruby on Rails application for a business that buys and sells used phones. Features inventory management, pricing tools, and customer transaction processing.

description: Professional website for a life insurance agent featuring client testimonials, policy information, and contact forms for insurance consultations.
